name: Uncharged
description:
Uncharged is an isometric shooter.

The concept of uncharged is that it is a world devoid of power, there are many robots with light bulbs attached to them that just wander around seamlessly, when one day lightning hits a robot (you the player) and you gain charge in your light bulb and weapon.

Enemies run at you attempting to steal your electricity for themselves. If you kill an enemy, they have a chance to drop the stored power that they have been storing up until that point.
